description:
High-performance fins for kids who like to swim fast and spend all day snorkelling around reefs and lagoons. The centre pocket channels water and stabilizes the fin, so less energy is used to gain forward speed.

  • Durable thermoplastic construction
  • Flexible centre panel focuses thrust and increases your swimming efficiency
  • Soft, comfortable foot pocket
  • Open heel with adjustable strap accommodates a wide range of foot sizes. S/M fits 9-13, L/XL fits 1-4
name: Fathom Barbados Junior Fins - Children to Youths
